--- create_table_fulltext_albums.sql
-- https://cloud.google.com/spanner/docs/full-text-search/search-indexes#search-index-schema-definitions
CREATE TABLE Albums (
                        AlbumId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL,
                        SingerId INT64 NOT NULL,
                        ReleaseTimestamp INT64 NOT NULL,
                        AlbumTitle STRING(MAX),
                        Rating FLOAT64,
                        AlbumTitle_Tokens TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_FULLTEXT(AlbumTitle)) HIDDEN,
                        Rating_Tokens TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_NUMBER(Rating)) HIDDEN
) PRIMARY KEY(AlbumId)
--- AST
&ast.CreateTable{
  Create: 105,
  Rparen: 575,
  Name:   &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 118,
        NameEnd: 124,
        Name:    "Albums",
      },
    },
  },
  Columns: []*ast.ColumnDef{
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: 175,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 151,
        NameEnd: 158,
        Name:    "AlbumId",
      },
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 159,
        Rparen:  169,
        Name:    "STRING",
        Max:     true,
      },
      NotNull: true,
      Hidden:  -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: 224,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 205,
        NameEnd: 213,
        Name:    "SingerId",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 214,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull: true,
      Hidden:  -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: 281,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 254,
        NameEnd: 270,
        Name:    "ReleaseTimestamp",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 271,
        Name:    "INT64",
      },
      NotNull: true,
      Hidden:  -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 311,
        NameEnd: 321,
        Name:    "AlbumTitle",
      },
      Type: &ast.SizedSchemaType{
        NamePos: 322,
        Rparen:  332,
        Name:    "STRING",
        Max:     true,
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 359,
        NameEnd: 365,
        Name:    "Rating",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 366,
        Name:    "FLOAT64",
      },
      Hidden: -1,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 399,
        NameEnd: 416,
        Name:    "AlbumTitle_Tokens",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 417,
        Name:    "TOKENLIST",
      },
      GeneratedExpr: &ast.GeneratedColumnExpr{
        As:     427,
        Stored: -1,
        Rparen: 460,
        Expr:   &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 459,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 431,
            NameEnd: 448,
            Name:    "TOKENIZE_FULLTEXT",
          },
          Args: []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 449,
                NameEnd: 459,
                Name:    "AlbumTitle",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      Hidden: 462,
    },
    &ast.ColumnDef{
      Null: -1,
      Name: &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 494,
        NameEnd: 507,
        Name:    "Rating_Tokens",
      },
      Type: &ast.ScalarSchemaType{
        NamePos: 508,
        Name:    "TOKENLIST",
      },
      GeneratedExpr: &ast.GeneratedColumnExpr{
        As:     518,
        Stored: -1,
        Rparen: 545,
        Expr:   &ast.CallExpr{
          Rparen: 544,
          Func:   &ast.Ident{
            NamePos: 522,
            NameEnd: 537,
            Name:    "TOKENIZE_NUMBER",
          },
          Args: []ast.Arg{
            &ast.ExprArg{
              Expr: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 538,
                NameEnd: 544,
                Name:    "Rating",
              },
            },
          },
        },
      },
      Hidden: 547,
    },
  },
  PrimaryKeys: []*ast.IndexKey{
    &ast.IndexKey{
      DirPos: -1,
      Name:   &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 568,
        NameEnd: 575,
        Name:    "AlbumId",
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE TABLE Albums (
  AlbumId STRING(MAX) NOT NULL,
  SingerId INT64 NOT NULL,
  ReleaseTimestamp INT64 NOT NULL,
  AlbumTitle STRING(MAX),
  Rating FLOAT64,
  AlbumTitle_Tokens TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_FULLTEXT(AlbumTitle)) HIDDEN,
  Rating_Tokens TOKENLIST AS (TOKENIZE_NUMBER(Rating)) HIDDEN
) PRIMARY KEY (AlbumId)
